title: Staircase and corridor lighting shall also be connected to alternate supply as defined in sub-Regulations (4)
clause_text: Staircase and corridor lighting shall also be connected to alternate supply as defined in sub-Regulations (4). However, for assembly and institutional buildings less than 32 m. when the alternate source of supply may be provided by battery continuously trickle- charged from the electric mains.
